description: Since its inception in 2013, Opalina has been trusted with Solutions; Simple, Straight-forward and Efficient. Opalina Technologies, a Go-to Software company for projects that are usually complex nuts to crack. Our expertise lie in untying knots in the shortest possible time, to deliver sustainable solutions, building Trust through our niche delivery.

LeadingIndia.ai has the potential to change the landscape of AI Research in India. Due to the Interdisciplinary nature of applications in this domain.Start-ups and industry involved in the Artificial Intelligence related work will partner for providing application-inspired ideas and absorbing the trained graduates of these institutions.
